EntryName	SIAT1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Beta-galactoside alpha-2,6-sialyltransferase 1 (Alpha 2,6-ST 1) (EC 2.4.3.1) (B-cell antigen CD75) (CMP-N-acetylneuraminate-beta-galactosamide-alpha-2,6-sialyltransferase 1) (ST6Gal I) (ST6GalI) (Sialyltransferase 1)

Length	406
Function	Transfers sialic acid from CMP-sialic acid to galactose-containing acceptor substrates.
